title: Kuwait to introduce freelance visa with KD 1,000 fee and no sponsor required - Here’s how to apply?
summary_full: Kuwait is introducing a new freelance residency permit within two months, allowing skilled expatriates to work independently without an employer sponsor. This initiative, with an annual fee of KD 750-1,000, aims to combat visa trading and tighten labor market regulations by redirecting payments to the government.
